Html: Are there any plans to develop the core Prism libraries to work on Silverlight also? I already have the Prism libraries running on SL Beta 1 but there are already a couple of issues mostly with the MetaDataInfo class because of DependencyObject not having any public constructors in SL.

Currently we are keeping the focus on WPF in order that we do not lose focus. We will be looking at Prism in the context of Silverlight in the future. There has also been talk of a Silverlight port in our soon to be launched Prism contrib project. Maybe you can help out ;)
Yes, I would be interested in contributing to that projects. What is the timeframe for the Prism contrib being public?
Now Silverlight 2 Beta 2 is out is there going to be a prism version for silverlight available soon?
